name: SoulMage
description:
This is a game created over the course of 2 weeks. Its made by 2 people and the story sets in a wizard world where you need to make choices and choose whether you want to join the dark side or reject it. The game has 6+ Endings and 15+ choices, over 9 unique characters providing a variety of content. Full 100% the game takes at most 1 hour but a single playthrough takes like 10 minutes (Press Spacebar or Left click to proceed dialogue) 

Programmer: @youshen_is_tired
Story Writer: @tym_0914
